form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, OMB No. 4-38-R0079

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Form approved OMB No. 43-R0079 FEE STAMP APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION IMMIGHATION & Mail or take to: NATURALIZATION IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE SERVICE OCT 14 1 04PH'76 INFORMATA ALIEN REGISTRATION (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH (Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration receipt card. and the number OF your card. If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT.) Name Rangel-Mendez, Desiderio No. A-12-491-240 OCT 21 1976 Date: 9-20-76 My name is: Desiderio Rangel (Print or type here your present full name only) I live at: 10861 S.V. 7 St. Aptl (Print or type present apartment number, street address, and if appropriate "in care of' Sweet water DAde Fla 33174 (City) (County) (State) (ZIP Code) Other names I have used are: Hone MENDEZ (mother name / (Print or type here any other name you have ever used, including maiden name) My present occupation is ( Retired) NONE Sex Male Female (1a) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? (If "Yes" explain fully separately) Yes No (1b) Can you read and write English? Yes No (1c) Can you speak English? Yes No (1d) Can you sign your name in English? Yes No (2) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. FROM To- STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) 5 19 76 PRESENT TIME 10861 S.Wo 7 St. Apt I Miami Fla (b) I 19 66 2 76 2376--- St. Astoria "-ew York (c) 19 19 (d) 19 19 no others (3) What were the names, addresses, and occupations (or types of business) of your employers during the last 5 years? NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, Bus DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES 5 RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES MO 7-1971 8-1971 Air, France New York MO7-1974 8-1974 Taca Air line no (5) How many times have you been married? 2-L How many times has your husband or wife been married? 2.
